# Identify (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[Divination (Domain)|Divination 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (wine stirred with an owlâ€™s feather)

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped emanation

**Duration:** 3 rounds/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 299

This spell functions as *[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]*, except that it gives you a +10 enhancement bonus on [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks made to identify the properties and command words of magic items in your possession. This spell does not allow you to identify artifacts.
